entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 8:40AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RESUSPENDED ASH FROM KATMAI-NOVARUPTA TODAY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... Strong northwesterly winds gusting 65 to 85 mph across the Alaska Peninsula are resuspending ash created from the 1912 Katmai eruption.
